response: Hello! How can I help you?
Itaxeasy is an AI-driven platform for easing the process of doing taxes.

1. Click on "File ITR" Button
2. Upload your Form 16
3. Download JSON File and upload it to Income Tax Website
You can file GSTR by going to "GST Return" section of Billshill By Itaxeasy

intents: What is Due date for filing IT Return
What is last day for of filing itr
response: You must file your income tax returns (ITR) for the financial year ending 31st March by 31st July of the same year.
